title: Quinoa Bar Vegetaria
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Organic, Western, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Spanish
description: A dog-friendly vegetarian cafe and bar opened by an Italian, since Aug 2013. Offers a variety of food: salads, soups, gazpacho, sandwiches, veggie burgers, tofu and seitan sausages. The beverage list includes fresh juices, smoothies, tea, coffee, organic beer, wine, and cocktails. Free Wi-Fi.
